data.actual_result: The channel is in the same unread state as observed in step 3
data.expected_result: It should show only the messages sent after step 4 as unread
data.short_description: Foreground service for game detection prevents the current channel from being marked as read upon closing/reopening Discord, even after a long time spent on another app
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Foregound service for game detection - Find a channel with a few unread messages (less than 50) - Switch to that channel. If you see the New messages separator and the X new messages banner at the top, you're good - Close Discord - Open a game and play it for a while. Actually it can be any app, not related to the game detection feature itself - Reopen Discord
